name: Pity Party :(
description:
The party is out of control, don't lose control of yourself!

You're at a party that's a little bit too rowdy for you. You decide that it's high time you got home, as you feel your anxiety slowly growing.

Objective: 

Get home without having a panic attack!

Controls: 

- WASD or keyboard keys

- Space to jump

- Hidden key for a hidden feature.

Known bugs:

- Small collision issues.
